Title: Hyper-v Replication control
Description: PowerShell scripts helping managing Hyper-v Replication
HomeWiki:
Project Description
PowerShell scripts helping managing Hyper-v Replication


Scripts helping in managing Hyper-v Replication feature.

currently available:
  • resume-BrokenReplication - force resume replication for all machines
  • send-ReplicationReport (obsolete)
  • prepare-ReplicationReport - flexible script to prepare report and check on current replication stats
